title: Policy Engine (OPA/Rego)
description: This document describes the policy engine in the zero-trust control plane backend: OPA/Rego integration, policy structure (database, domain, API, Rego contract), default policy, and the full evaluation flow. The policy engine is used only for device-trust / MFA decisions (when to require MFA, whether to register trust after MFA, and trust TTL in days). For device-trust semantics and MFA flows, see device-trust.md and mfa.md.
